author: Special Correspondent
text:
Responding to demands the AIADMK MPs made in Parliament, seeking action against him on allegations of money laundering, Congress member Karti Chidambaram, on Tuesday, said all his businesses were “compliant” with rules and regulations.

“Myself and my business are fully compliant with laws and regulations,” said an official statement from Mr. Karti, son of former Union Finance Minister P. Chidambaram.

Swamy writes to Modi

Meanwhile, former Union Minister Subramanian Swamy, in a letter to Prime Minister Narendra Modi, wanted a Special Investigation Team (SIT) set up to probe the matter.
title: My businesses compliant with law: Karti Chidambaram
